alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:10PM CDT until June 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HINDS AND SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 910 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Annandale, or 7 miles west of Gluckstadt, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Madison and Gluckstadt around 915 PM CDT. Canton around 920 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
